description: Travis and Jason catch up with the winner of the New York Open, George Armour from Maple Leaf Wargaming. Warpcoven are a strong early contender, and George is here to share some tips from his favored sons. December 14th MapleLeaf WarGaming is running their first KT team tournament!  BCP link: https://www.bestcoastpairings.com/event/xqigxWiS6Xpt Google doc with more […]
title: JAKTP 90: Warp Coven Deep Dive with NYO 1st Place George

description: I’m a fan of Warhammer 40,000. I have children. I have friends who like board games but  don’t find wargaming attractive. Maybe I just stumbled across the gateway I’ve been looking for. Space Marine Adventures: Tyranid Attack! is a cooperative board game that aims to bring the grimdark 40K universe to the family table without too […]
title: Space Marine Adventures: Tyranid Attack! A Family & Budget Friendly Introduction to 40K

description: In Hammer of Math, we take a look at key statistical issues in wargames. Today we’re looking at how balance updates have impacted factions throughout the 10th edition of Warhammer 40,000. Tenth Edition gave us our first “reset” edition since the 8th Edition rewrite of the game back in 2017. A full range of indexes […]
title: Hammer of Math: Impact of Balance Adjustments in 10th Edition Warhammer 40,000

description: Thank you to Wargames Atlantic for providing the 25mm Textured Bases for review Bases are often an afterthought in the tabletop wargaming space. You use whatever comes in the box, maybe order some MDF bases or movement trays if you’re playing a game that requires them, and call it a day. Wargames Atlantic is aiming […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals – Wargames Atlantic Base Double Review

description: We look at Secret Missions in Warhammer 40k - how they work, how to play with them, and how to prevent them.
title: Start Competing: Pariah Nexus Secret Missions
